author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe
message: Correction does much, but encouragement does more.
title: Thought of the day

author: Epictetus
message: Know, first, who you are, and then adorn yourself accordingly.
title: Thought of the day

author: Oprah Winfrey
message: The biggest adventure you can ever take is to live the life of your dreams.
title: Thought of the day

author: Charles Swindoll
message: Life is 10% what happens to you and 90% how you react to it.
title: Thought of the day
